text: - I'm Ayush Saxena,

I'm an engagement manager with
AWS Proserve, public sector.
(upbeat music)
As an engagement manager, I'm responsible

for the end to end delivery of
the projects that we are on.
I'm also responsible

for building the relationship
with the customer,

and help them with their
cloud transformation journeys.

I've always been in the
consulting industry,

but I've always focused
on the commercial sector.

I wanted to bring that experience
back to the public sector,

because I think everything
that I do, we do as a company

and a team come back to the
community, our families.
So that was my driving force

so that we can give something
back to the community.

We've got such competent
people who bring in years

of experience in the cloud
space and even after that,

I find the culture overall
at AWS Proserve and my team,
the people are very, very helpful.
They want to support you.

You can reach out to them
at any given point in time

and they would want to
do the best for you.
If I just look back at my team itself,
it's a very mixed team.

You've got people from
different languages,
different countries,

and everybody is
respectful for each other.

And the best part is
having such a diverse team

helps you appreciate
the different cultures.
So it's good to see that.

And yeah, I think it promotes
the feeling camaraderie,

breaks the walls that
typically exist in the society,
and helps us move forward.
(bright lively music)
